languages.text: {n}Эдельтрад смотрит на вас с теплотой змеи.{/n} "Санционированные псайкеры — редкое и ценное орудие {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Золотого Трона{/g}. Или же ты, {name}, предполагал{mf||а} использовать еретиков, которые противны свету {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Бога-Императора{/g}? Весьма опрометчиво говорить о подобном в присутствии верных слуг Его".

traits.locale_text: {n}Эдельтрад смотрит на вас с теплотой змеи.{/n} "Санционированные псайкеры — редкое и ценное орудие {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Золотого Трона{/g}. Или же ты, {name}, предполагал{mf||а} использовать еретиков, которые противны свету {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Бога-Императора{/g}? Весьма опрометчиво говорить о подобном в присутствии верных слуг его".

languages.text: {n}Edelthrad looks at you with the warmth of a snake.{/n} "Sanctioned psykers are rare and valuable instruments of the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}. Or do you, {name}, suggest that we use heretics who are an offence to the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}God-Emperor{/g}'s light? It would be rather careless of you to utter such profanity in the presence of His faithful servants."
languages.original_text: {n}Эдельтрад смотрит на вас с теплотой змеи.{/n} "Санционированные псайкеры — редкое и ценное орудие {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Золотого Трона{/g}. Весьма опрометчиво говорить о подобном в присутствии верных слуг Его".

languages.text: {n}艾德萨德语气很温和，像蛇一样盯着你。{/n}“得到授权的灵能者是{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}黄金王座{/g}宝贵的工具。还是说，{name}，你在建议我们雇佣那些冒犯{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}神皇{/g}之光的异端分子？你在祂忠诚的仆人面前，说这种充满亵渎的话语，这恐怕太不合适了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Edelthrad looks at you with the warmth of a snake.{/n} "Sanctioned psykers are rare and valuable instruments of the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}. Or do you, {name}, suggest that we use heretics who are an offence to the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}God-Emperor{/g}'s light? It would be rather careless of you to utter such profanity in the presence of His faithful servants."

traits.locale_text: {n}艾德萨德语气很温和，像蛇一样盯着你。{/n}“得到授权的灵能者是{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}黄金王座{/g}宝贵的工具。还是说，{name}，你在建议我们雇佣那些冒犯{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}神皇{/g}之光的异端分子？你在祂忠诚的仆人面前，说这种充满亵渎的话语，这恐怕太不合适了。”

languages.text: {n}Edelthrad te mira con toda la calidez de una serpiente.{/n} «Los psíquicos autorizados son instrumentos raros y valiosos del {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trono Dorado{/g}. ¿O acaso está sugiriendo que usemos a herejes cuya mera existencia ofende a la luz del {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Dios Emperador{/g}, {name}? Sería una imprudencia sugerir tal cosa ante sus sirvientes más fieles».
languages.original_text: {n}Edelthrad looks at you with the warmth of a snake.{/n} "Sanctioned psykers are rare and valuable instruments of the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}. Or do you, {name}, suggest that we use heretics who are an offence to the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}God-Emperor{/g}'s light? It would be rather careless of you to utter such profanity in the presence of His faithful servants."

traits.locale_text: {n}Edelthrad te mira con toda la calidez de una serpiente.{/n} «Los psíquicos autorizados son instrumentos raros y valiosos del {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trono Dorado{/g}. ¿O acaso está sugiriendo que usemos a herejes cuya mera existencia ofende a la luz del {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Dios Emperador{/g}, {name}? Sería una imprudencia sugerir tal cosa ante sus sirvientes más fieles».

languages.text: {n}エデルスラドはヘビのような、ぬるいまなざしであなたを見る。{/n}「公認異能者は{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}黄金の玉座{/g}の稀有で貴重な道具である。それとも、{name}は{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}神帝陛下{/g}を侮辱する異端者を使うことを提案しているのか？神の忠実な僕たちの前でそのような冒涜的な言葉を発するのは、むしろ不注意だ」
languages.original_text: {n}Edelthrad looks at you with the warmth of a snake.{/n} "Sanctioned psykers are rare and valuable instruments of the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}. Or do you, {name}, suggest that we use heretics who are an offence to the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}God-Emperor{/g}'s light? It would be rather careless of you to utter such profanity in the presence of His faithful servants."

traits.locale_text: {n}エデルスラドはヘビのぬるいまなざしであなたを見る。{/n}「公認異能者は{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}黄金の玉座{/g}の稀有で貴重な道具だ。それとも、{name}{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}神帝陛下{/g}を侮辱する異端者を使うことを提案するのか？神の忠実な僕たちの前でそのような冒涜的な言葉を発するのは、むしろ不注意だ」
{n}エデルスラドはヘビのような、ぬるいまなざしであなたを見る。{/n}「公認異能者は{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}黄金の玉座{/g}の稀有で貴重な道具である。それとも、{name}は{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}神帝陛下{/g}を侮辱する異端者を使うことを提案しているのか？神の忠実な僕たちの前でそのような冒涜的な言葉を発するのは、むしろ不注意だ」

languages.text: {n}Edelthrad vous fixe avec la bienveillance d'un serpent.{/n} « Les psykers assermentés sont de précieux instruments du {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trône d'Or{/g}, mais ils sont rares. Seriez-vous en train de suggérer, {name}, d'employer des hérétiques dont l'existence même est une insulte à la lumière de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur-Dieu{/g} ? Il serait imprudent de votre part de proférer de telles obscénités en présence de Ses fidèles serviteurs. »
languages.original_text: {n}Edelthrad looks at you with the warmth of a snake.{/n} "Sanctioned psykers are rare and valuable instruments of the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}. Or do you, {name}, suggest that we use heretics who are an offence to the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}God-Emperor{/g}'s light? It would be rather careless of you to utter such profanity in the presence of His faithful servants."

traits.locale_text: {n}Edelthrad vous fixe avec la bienveillance d'un serpent.{/n} « Les psykers assermentés sont de précieux instruments du {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trône d'Or{/g}, mais ils sont rares. Seriez-vous en train de suggérer, {name}, d'employer des hérétiques dont l'existence même est une insulte à la lumière de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur-Dieu{/g} ? Il serait imprudent de votre part de proférer de telles obscénités en présence de Ses fidèles serviteurs. »

languages.text: {n}Edelthrad sieht dich mit einem kalten Schlangenblick an.{/n} "Sanktionierte Psioniker sind seltene und wertvolle Instrumente des {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Goldenen Throns{/g}. Oder wollt Ihr etwa vorschlagen, {name}, dass wir Ketzer einsetzen, die eine Beleidigung des Lichts des {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Gottimperators{/g} darstellen? Es wäre sehr unvorsichtig von Euch, in der Anwesenheit Seiner treuen Diener dergleichen zu äußern."
languages.original_text: {n}Edelthrad looks at you with the warmth of a snake.{/n} "Sanctioned psykers are rare and valuable instruments of the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}. It would be rather careless of you to utter such profanity in the presence of His faithful servants."

languages.text: {n}Edelthrad sana bir yılanın sıcaklığıyla bakıyor.{/n} "Onaylı ruhsezerler, {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Altın Taht'ın{/g} nadir ve değerli birer araçlarıdır. Yoksa sen, {name}, varlıkları {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Tanrı İmparator'un{/g} ışığına hakaret olan kâfirleri kullanmayı mı öneriyorsun? O'nun sadık hizmetkârlarının huzurunda böyle kafirce şeyler dile getirmen epey dikkatsiz bir davranış olur."
languages.original_text: {n}Edelthrad looks at you with the warmth of a snake.{/n} "Sanctioned psykers are rare and valuable instruments of the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Golden Throne{/g}.
